Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Initial Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz and Alley Oop and sets up initial conflicts and humorous scenarios.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Deception and Alley's Retribution
sub_scenes.description: King Guz pretends to drown to avoid debt, leading to a humorous confrontation with Alley Oop.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Clumsiness and the Dinosaur Trade Consideration
sub_scenes.description: Dinny's clumsiness leads to a discussion about trading him in for a newer dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Visiting Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop visits a dinosaur dealership to explore trading Dinny.

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive Mishap and Ominous Purchase
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop test drives a new dinosaur, which leads to a mishap but a finalized purchase.

narrative_arcs.title: Compact Dino Test Drive and Initial Impression
Zog's Sales Pitch Confirmation and Ominous Dino

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Fate at the Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is marked down at the dealership, and another caveman considers buying him.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Sales and Dinny's Re-emergence
sub_scenes.description: Various dinosaur sales pitches and another fall incident lead to the surprising return of Dinny.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment, Rescue, and Welcomed Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Dinny faces mistreatment but is defended and then anticipates a welcome arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance and Promise of Reunion with Zog

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Frustrations
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on romantic interactions, misunderstandings, and comedic frustrations between characters.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Argument with Coola
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop invites Coola fishing, leading to rejection and an argument.

sub_scenes.title: Male Grievances: Women and Fishing
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen express general frustrations about women and specific annoyances during fishing.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Encounters and Social Dynamics
sub_scenes.description: Various romantic encounters and social interactions unfold, including jealousy and compliments.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy, Violence, and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy leads to violence, clarification, and ultimate rejection in a romantic triangle.

sub_scenes.title: Learning the Ways of Romance
sub_scenes.description: A caveman attempts to learn romance after facing rejection, seeking advice and observation.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Romance as a Strategy
Plan to Learn and Apply Romance Techniques

sub_scenes.title: Misinterpreted Romance and Violent Attempts
sub_scenes.description: Misguided attempts at romance lead to humorous and violent misunderstandings.

sub_scenes.title: Cannibalism Misunderstanding and Oola's Hand Kiss
sub_scenes.description: A series of misunderstandings culminates in a cannibalism accusation and clarification of a hand kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Relationship Troubles and Romantic Attempts
sub_scenes.description: Various relationship issues and attempts at romance are depicted, showcasing different facets of caveman relationships.

narrative_arcs.title: Infidelity Accusation and Plea for Forgiveness

Major_Arcs.title: The Twist Dance Fad and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes social fads, focusing on the sudden popularity and disastrous outcomes of 'The Twist' dance.

sub_scenes.title: The Twist Dance Craze and Social Pressure
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of 'The Twist', its injuries, and social pressure to participate.

narrative_arcs.title: The Perils of the New Twist Dance
Social Pressure and Reluctance to Dance
Forced Participation and Impending Dance Party

sub_scenes.title: Painful Dance Lessons and Miss Glump's Secret
sub_scenes.description: A caveman seeks dance lessons for 'The Twitch', leading to a painful learning process and a humorous identity reveal.

narrative_arcs.title: Desire to Learn Dance for Ooola

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Party and its Disastrous Consequences
sub_scenes.description: A 'Twitch' party leads to humiliation, injuries, and a hospital ward full of patients.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel, initially for historical research, but quickly intertwined with romantic elements and mishaps.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel for Research and a Glimpse into the Past
sub_scenes.description: Researchers decide to use time travel to gather information about 16th Century Spain, glimpsing Oop's romantic life in the past.

narrative_arcs.title: The Treatise on Spain and Time Travel Idea
Romantic Encounter with Oop in the Past

sub_scenes.title: The Kiss Interrupted by Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: Oop and Oola's long-awaited kiss is unexpectedly interrupted by time travel.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Tuning and Imminent Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Welcome to the Future and Quick Return to the Past
sub_scenes.description: Oop and Oola are briefly brought to the 20th century for a research assignment before being quickly returned to their time.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment
Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Spain and Serenade Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Oop arrives in ancient Spain and intervenes in a serenade, leading to unexpected consequences.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Bewilderment

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Serenade Intervention and Matador Mishap
sub_scenes.description: Oop's intervention in the serenade results in him attacking a famous matador, leading to further complications.

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Replacement and Arena Entrance
sub_scenes.description: Due to the matador's injury, a naive man is chosen as a novelty replacement for the bullfight.

narrative_arcs.title: The Injured Matador and a Novelty Replacement
The Unlikely Bullfighter Enters the Arena

sub_scenes.title: The Unconventional Bullfight and Victory
sub_scenes.description: The bullfight commences with the unlikely bullfighter achieving a surprising victory using a club.

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Return and Jealousy Interruption
sub_scenes.description: Oop returns from his mission, but a promised kiss is interrupted by jealousy.

narrative_arcs.title: Promise of a Kiss and Rescue

Major_Arcs.title: Kingly Life and Abdication
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous trials and tribulations of being 'King for a Day', leading to an unexpected abdication.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Challenge
sub_scenes.description: A caveman becomes 'King for a Day' and is challenged to prove it's not an easy job.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day and a Challenge

sub_scenes.title: King's Popularity and Revolt
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king faces a revolt from his people, highlighting the challenges of leadership.

sub_scenes.title: King's Domestic Troubles and Vacation Thoughts
sub_scenes.description: The King experiences domestic disputes and starts to understand the appeal of vacations.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Foot Washing Order

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Dispute and Missing Treasure
sub_scenes.description: A clam dispute arises, which the King attempts to resolve, only for the clams to mysteriously disappear.

sub_scenes.title: Attack, Accusation, and Dinner Chaos
sub_scenes.description: The King faces an attack, accusations of greed, and chaotic mealtime disruptions.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Demands and Prank Gone Wrong
sub_scenes.description: The King asserts his royal status and faces a prank that turns violent.

narrative_arcs.title: Demanding Royal Treatment and Specific Food
Appetizer Satisfaction and Anticipation for Main Course

sub_scenes.title: King's Abdication
sub_scenes.description: Following the prank incident, the King apologizes and decides to abdicate, relieved to be ordinary again.

narrative_arcs.title: Apology and Job Offer After Violence
King's Relief at Being Ordinary Again

Major_Arcs.title: Strange Duck Observation
Major_Arcs.description: A brief, humorous interlude focused on the observation of a peculiar character 'Strange Duck'.

sub_scenes.title: Measuring Strange Duck
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen curiously observe and attempt to measure 'Strange Duck' for unknown reasons.

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act: Forced Shaving
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a 'Barberous Act' which turns out to be a humorous scenario of forced shaving.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to 'Barberous Act' and Forced Shaving Parlor
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of 'Barberous Act' title and a scene leading to a forced shaving parlor.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to 'Barberous Act' and Romantic Alley
Ooola's Sudden Departure and Justified Violence

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Unexpected Visitor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a time machine experiment gone wrong, resulting in the arrival of an unexpected Roman soldier.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Roman Soldier
sub_scenes.description: A time machine experiment malfunctions, bringing a Roman soldier instead of the intended visitor.
